name: Tech Design Studios
tagline: East Bay Web Design and Internet Marketing Company
description:
Tech Design Studios is a computer services company located in Lafayette, CA specializing in web design & development, internet marketing, graphic design and tech support.
We develop websites that are both user and search engine friendly while staying compliant with web standards to ensure your content is available to the widest possible audience. We take into consideration your marketing goals and develop a comprehensive plan focusing on your target audience.
